column1: Forweg was a Men of the House of Hador
column2: who deserted the field of the Nirnaeth Arnoediad ("Battle of Unnumbered Tears") and fled into the south to live as an outlaw. He became the leader of the Gaurwaith
column4: and allowed Túrin to join them after Túrin had left Doriath.

column1: One day in the spring of the year after Túrin had become a member of the Gaurwaith
column2: Forweg and Andróg disappeared from their camp.  Irritated by the outlaws squalid camp Túrin wandered into the woods.  Suddenly he saw a young woman running from a hazel-thicket in fear who fell upon the ground.  Túrin drew his sword and killed one of her pursuers
column3: who turned out to be Forweg.  Túrin then returned to the other outlaws and claimed the captaincy
